share on x dw dave wittekjun 14 at 9:57 am big al i'll always remember you as a boss ballplayer and partier lol rest in peace dave wittekcomment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jun 13 at 11:17 am basket full of wishes was purchased for the family of allen e. kunze. share on x dawn both-kim. jun 12 at 8:31 pm i will miss papa al at the wnypbn events. he was always around to help out. he was such a kind and sweet man. he touched my life only briefly, but will always be remembered.-dawnie. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 14. 1:00 pm - 5:00 pm daniel r. smolarek funeral home - cheektowaga2510 union road. cheektowaga, ny, us, 14227. get missed the service? send flowers or gifts to the family's home. prayer service. jun 14. 4:30 pm daniel r. smolarek funeral home - cheektowaga2510 union road. cheektowaga, ny, us, 14227. get missed the service? send flowers or gifts to the family's home. wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe facebook daniel r. smolarek funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
